text:

author: U. G.
text:
Just like Alex Badeh, we have lost Ahmed Gulak to UGM. For a retired general failing woefully at securing lives and properties is shocking! Nigeria today is as unsafe as I can never remember.

A man who can't guarantee safety at home travels abroad to make inputs on Mali.🤦‍♂️

author: U. G.
text:
We have slowly watched Bubu run this country to the ground.

"A general who intends fighting several battles at one swoop is foolish"

Ahmed Gulak

author: U. G.
text:
Reminiscing on the account of the civil war as described by my "young teenage" father; 
"When the first bomb came home, mothers gathered their kids and fled into the bush"

Mum was too young to process the memories.
